docblock.long-description: It will be read from the version attribute (install tag) in the manifest file

docblock.description: preflight runs before anything else and while the extracted files are in the uploaded temp folder.
docblock.long-description: If preflight returns false, Joomla will abort the update and undo everything already done.

tag.name: param
tag.description: is the type of change (install, update or discover_install, not uninstall).

tag.name: param
tag.description: is the class calling this method.

docblock.description: install runs after the database scripts are executed.
docblock.long-description: If the extension is new, the install method is run. If install returns false, Joomla will abort the install and undo everything already done.

tag.name: param
tag.description: is the class calling this method.

docblock.description: update runs after the database scripts are executed.
docblock.long-description: If the extension exists, then the update method is run. If this returns false, Joomla will abort the update and undo everything already done.

tag.name: param
tag.description: is the class calling this method.

docblock.description: postflight is run after the extension is registered in the database.

tag.name: param
tag.description: is the type of change (install, update or discover_install, not uninstall).

tag.name: param
tag.description: is the class calling this method.

docblock.description: uninstall runs before any other action is taken (file removal or database processing)
get a variable from the manifest file (actually, from the manifest cache).
sets parameter values in the component's row of the extension table

docblock.description: The sublayout to use when rendering the results.
The type of content that the adapter indexes.
The field the published state is stored in.

tag.name: param
tag.description: &$subject The object to observe

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array that holds the plugin configuration

docblock.description: Method to update the item link information when the item category is changed.
docblock.long-description: This is fired when the item category is published or unpublished from the list view.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The extension whose category has been updated.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A list of primary key ids of the content that has changed state.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the state that the content has been changed to.

docblock.description: Method to remove the link information for items that have been deleted.
docblock.long-description: This event will fire when ChurchDirectory are deleted and when an indexed item is deleted.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The context of the action being performed.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A JTable object containing the record to be deleted

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: on database error.

docblock.description: Method to determine if the access level of an item changed.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The context of the content passed to the plugin.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A JTable object

tag.name: param
tag.description: If the content has just been created

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: on database error.

docblock.description: Method to reindex the link information for an item that has been saved.
docblock.long-description: This event is fired before the data is actually saved so we are going to queue the item to be indexed later.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The context of the content passed to the plugin.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A JTable object

tag.name: param
tag.description: If the content is just about to be created

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: on database error.

docblock.description: Method to update the link information for items that have been changed from outside the edit screen.
docblock.long-description: This is fired when the item is published, unpublished, archived, or unarchived from the list view.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The context for the content passed to the plugin.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A list of primary key ids of the content that has changed state.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the state that the content has been changed to.

docblock.long-description: The item must be a FinderIndexerResult object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The item to index as an FinderIndexerResult object.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The item format

tag.name: throws
tag.description: on database error.

docblock.description: Method to setup the indexer to be run.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on success.

docblock.description: Method to get the SQL query used to retrieve the list of content items.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A JDatabaseQuery object or null.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A database object.
